se.kau.isgc08.lab4.view
Class DrawingUtil

java.lang.Object
  se.kau.isgc08.lab4.view.DrawingUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, DrawingUtilInterface
public class DrawingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawingUtilInterface

The Class DrawingUtil. This class holds the functionality for drawing on screen estate. Each method requires a valid DrawingUtil and Graphics instances to work.

See Also:
